description.en: This story will show the drifting soul of a lone manga artist whose heart has been used up.
description.pt-br: Fazer dinheiro é a única coisa que importa. E se seu primeiro mangá acabou e você não faz ideia de como começar o próximo. Seu casamento está acabando e seu amor por mangás foi destruído pela realidade cruel da industria e nada parece preencher o vazio dentro de você...
description.ru: Известный мангака заканчивает сериализацию манги. 10 лет неустанного труда. 30 лет жизни. Ради чего жил, и что оставило время.

biography.en:
Associated Names:
• Асано Инио
• 浅野一二〇

Name (in native language):
• 浅野いにお

Birth Date:
• September 22, 1980

Birth Place:
• Ibaraki, Japan

Previously worked as Takahashi Shin’s assistant on Saishuu Heiki Kanojo.

Asano created the acclaimed manga Solanin, which was released as a feature film in Japan in April 2010, starring Aoi Miyazaki. Known for creating character-driven, realist stories, ranging from slice of life to psychological horror, Asano won first prize in the 2001 GX competition for young manga artists. Yomiuri Shimbun described Asano as "one of the voices of his generation."

Satou Satsuki and Atsumori Ran were his assistants.

Married to Torikai Akane
